import React from 'react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; import poll from './Event' import './App.css' import test from "./test-assignment" function App() { return (
); } class BPP extends React.Component{ render(){ return (
Event
Away Home Name Group Category Sport State Country ID
); } componentDidMount(){ let eventItems=document.querySelector("#event_items"); let eventList=JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(test)); for(let val of eventList){ eventItems.innerHTML+=` ${val.awayName} ${val.homeName} ${val.createdAt} ${val.group} ${val.name} ${val.sport} ${val.state} ${val.country} ${val.id} ` /* Date Date Date < td className = "id" > Date Date < td className = "state" > Date Date */ //sportEvent.item(0).innerHTML+=val.awayName; } } } export default App;
